doc.field:
Personal—The Mountain Meadows Massacre.
SALT LAKE. Sept. 22. — Wm. B. Ogden and the Directors of the Northern pacific arrived last night, and leave to-morrow for the Puget sound via Sacramento, to determine the Pacific terminus of the road. Large quantities of rich ore is again coming in from Emma and other mines.
The Little Cottonwood Evening Journal, on the expose of the Mountain Meadow massacre, says the murdered victims of the priesthood will call from their bloody graves for vengeance.
